item.title: Chuck Lorreâ€™s vanity cards
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Chuck Lorre, creator of "Dharma & Greg" and co-creator of "Two and a Half Men" has been putting vanity cards with messages at the end of his episodes since the first Dharma & Greg. Since they're on the screen only for one second at the end of the episode you've got to pause very precisely or go to his website to read them. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
